item.title: Hadi attack suspect’s look changed: rental owner
item.description: A rent-a-car businessman at the centre of the probe into the attempted killing of Inqilab Moncho Convenor Sharif Osman bin Hadi has told a Dhaka court that the prime suspect looked markedly different now. item.title: Ekushey Book Fair postponed due to elections, opens Feb 20
item.description: The Amar Ekushey Book Fair has been postponed to Feb 20 due to the national elections and will continue through to Mar 15. The decision was confirmed at a meeting held at the Bangla Academy on Wednesday, bdnews24.com reports.
